name: FREERTOS
description: Indicates that FREERTOS is enabled and being used.

name: CM33
description: Indicates this is code running on the CM33 processor

name: CM33_0
description: Indicates this is code running on the first CM33 processor

name: CAT1
description: Indicates this device is a category 1 device. The categories are defined by Infineon and are used to group similiar devices together.

name: CAT1D
description: Indicates this device is a category 1 device from the PSOC Edge family.

name: LWIP
description: Indicates this is code using the Lightweight IP (LWIP) stack.

name: MBEDTLS
description: Indicates this codeis using the MBEDTLS library from Arm
